name: admin.usergroups.removeChannels
desc: Remove one or more default channels from an org-level IDP group (user group).

errors.channel_not_found: At least one of the provided channel IDs could not be found, or one of those channels has a type that is not supported.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this workspace.
errors.invalid_auth: The workspace specified is not part of this Enterprise organization.
errors.invalid_channels_limit: The number of channel IDs passed in is larger than 100.
errors.not_an_admin: The token provided is not associated with an Org Admin or Owner.
errors.not_an_enterprise: The token passed in does not belong to an Enterprise organization.
errors.usergroup_not_found: The IDP group provided was not found.
errors.internal_error: There was an internal error processing this requestâ€”please retry.
